## Cursor class

Class for a cursor. A cursor controls how a user navigates the Blockly AST.  Blockly.Cursor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Cursor extends Marker 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Marker](./blockly.marker.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [in()](./blockly.cursor.in.md) |  | Find the in connection or field.  The in element, or null if the current node is not set or there is no in value. |
|  [next()](./blockly.cursor.next.md) |  | Find the next connection, field, or block.  The next element, or null if the current node is not set or there is no next value. |
|  [out()](./blockly.cursor.out.md) |  | Find the out connection, field, or block.  The out element, or null if the current node is not set or there is no out value. |
|  [prev()](./blockly.cursor.prev.md) |  | Find the previous connection, field, or block.  The previous element, or null if the current node is not set or there is no previous value. |
